AvatarIconProps.name: children
AvatarIconProps.description: Instead of using the default children, you can pass in your own.

AvatarIconProps.name: icon
AvatarIconProps.deprecated:
The `string` type icon has been deprecated and will be removed in the future.
Please use a React icon component from the `@procore/core-icons/dist` package.

**Before**

```
<Avatar>
  <Avatar.Icon icon="building" />
</Avatar>
```

**After**

```
<Avatar>
  <Avatar.Icon icon={<Building />} />
</Avatar>
```

AvatarProps.name: size
AvatarProps.deprecated:
Size "xl" has been deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
Please use "lg" instead of "xl".

**Before**

`<Avatar size="xl" />`

**After**

`<Avatar size="lg" />`
